name: ANCHORS FOR ARMS - LISTEN REACT - OORT RECORDS
description: Anchors For Arms Listen.React (Oort Records Europe) Produced by Alan Douches (Fall out boy , Gym Glass Heroes , Alkaline trio , Agaisnt Me ,Mastodon , Hatebreed) Description: Anchors For Arms (Randolph, NJ) delivers a pounding attack, powered by machine gun drums, stinging guitars and in your face vocals. "Listen.React" sets a new standard for punk and hardcore merging into the music of the millenium. Packed with energy, enough to set off the world around you. For fans of A Wilhelm Scream, Rise Against, and Strung Out. Track listing 1. Roots, The 2. Machines 3. C'Mon Let's Go Break Their Arms 4. No Gravity 5. Dead Weight 6. Explosions 7. Come Together 8. 50 Is Conservative, 60 Is Provocative 9. Beyond All Doubt, Hope Lies to Us All 10. On 11. Kingdom Came (It Looks Like We're on Our Own) Free streaming Album !!!! name: ROSEMATTER -  Shooter's Gonna Choke - OORT RECORDS EUROPE
description: Rosematter Shooter's Gonna Choke (Oort Records Europe ) Limited Produced by Chris Badamy (The early november , The stating line , Midtown ,Crash Romeo, The Dillinger Escape Plan ) Description: The re-release of the hard to find, and extremely rare "Shooter's Gonna Choke". Simply entitled "Rosematter" the new release a massive 1- page layout, and links to a special website where fans can find all sort of goodies. Downloads of unreleased songs, video blogs, candid pictures of and by the band, and wallpaper can be found on this private and special site. For Fans Of: Paramore, 1997 and Gwen Stefani. name: THAT WAS SOMETHING - Bears !! - OORT RECORDS EUROPE
description: That Was Something Bears! (Oort Records Europe ) Produced by Paul Leavitt (I am Ghost , Senses Fail , All Time Low , Circa Survive ..) Description: THAT WAS SOMETHING (Detroit, MI) crafts a classic album of poetic catchy melodies and rhythms. Reaching deep within to explore the emotions of a band first on the road and the hurt for those left behind, the hope for those of the future. Standout tracks wrap themselves around intense feelings. Sure to be a favorite part of anyone's music collection. For Fans All Time Low , Forever sickest kids Free streaming Album Check out THAT WAS SOMETHING Tracks 1. Life In Costumation 2. name: FASTER FASTER - HOPES AND DREAMS - OORT RECORDS EUROPE
description:
Faster Faster Hopes And Dreams (Oort Records Europe) Produced by Lee Dyess (Mayday Parade , Evergreen Terrace , From First To Last ) Description: FASTER FASTER (Brunswick, GA) presents twelve tracks of clean, clever pop/punk masterpieces. The songs and musicianship create an atmosphere of discovery. A must-have disc for fans of modern rock. For Fans Of: Forever The Sickest Kids, Taking Back Sunday, and Fall Out Boy.
